channel.title: Recording software
channel.description: I need some good recording software. I'd prefer not to torrent, but I know a good free one isn't easy to come by, so any recommendations?

item.title: Recording software
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:6, topic:437902”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=540618.msg3959583#msg3959583 date=1333145208]
Surely windows sound recorder is alright…? I would’ve thought it’s the quality of the microphone that matters.
Depends what you’re recording I suppose.
[/quote]
I didn’t even know windows had a sound recorder. I’ve been using audacity and I guess I want something that I can also modify things like tone or pitch.[/quote]Audacity is capable of doing that. It’s always been the sound recorder/editor/mixer of my choice.

Read full topic

item.title: Recording software
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

reyx7:

Alright I torrented a 600$ program. This can be locked.

If you mean Camtasia… It’s just $300.
W/Snagit is 600, which is also torrentable.

The security is pretty pathetic.

item.title: Recording software
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Camtasia w/ key

You don’t have to download the keygen, just look on youtube for someone who has posted a key – no risk of viruses obviously

Read full topic

item.title: Recording software
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:6, topic:437902”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=540618.msg3959583#msg3959583 date=1333145208]
Surely windows sound recorder is alright…? I would’ve thought it’s the quality of the microphone that matters.
Depends what you’re recording I suppose.
[/quote]
I didn’t even know windows had a sound recorder. I’ve been using audacity and I guess I want something that I can also modify things like tone or pitch.[/quote]
So you want a sound editor… Adobe Soundbooth is what you need, I’ve also used Wavepad which was very good, neither are free (though both have trials last time I checked), if you’re looking for free and legal then Audacity is probably the best you’ll get.

Read full topic

Camstudio is free but it isn’t the best quality. I torrented fraps on my windows computer and it works pretty well.
